description: Aaresu Oukoku is a kingdom on the Continent. In order to prevent bloodshed with the neighboring http://anidb.net/ch101310 [Barugoguransu Oukoku], its http://anidb.net/ch101185 [ruler] married his http://anidb.net/ch54590 [oldest daughter] to its king, http://anidb.net/ch101178 [Francesco Chench]. However, Francesco ended up conquering the kingdom regardless.
name: Aaresu Oukoku
